NFL vice president Brian McCarthy said Michael Vick has been diligent in tending to community-relations commitments as part of commissioner Roger Goodell 's program of rehabilitation for him following his incarceration for federal dogfighting offenses. He's done a great job turning things around, Brian McCarthy said. ''He still meets regularly with the commissioner and fulfills his obligations.'' Michael Vick also continues to have conversations with former Colts coach Tony Dungy , who was assigned to mentor him.

Eric Schmidt is also keeping for himself the outside-facing parts of CEO-dom which Silicon Vally nerds by their nature are pretty bad at. He has a clumsy way of putting it, but when he talks about the deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership that are increasingly important given Google's global reach, he basically means the large part of the CEO job which involves schmoozing various people in Google's interest. This is an interesting role, in terms of US corporate governance. Non-executive chairmen are common,

Just 15 days after the terrorist attacks of Sept. 11, 2001, President Bush invited his defense secretary, Donald Rumsfeld Barack Obama Donald Rumsfeld , to meet with him alone in the Oval Office. According to Mr. Donald Rumsfeld 's new memoir, the president leaned back in his leather chair and ordered a review and revision of war plans- but not for Afghanistan, where the Qaeda attacks on New York and George Washington had been planned and where George Washington retaliation was imminent. But NBC's Jim Miklaszewski says that according to notes taken in the ''tank'' at the Pentagon only FOUR HOURS after George Washington Flight 77 slammed into the building, it was Donald Rumsfeld himself who raised the possibility of attacking

Mike Pence announcement expected today, not tomorrow POLITICO has learned: Rep. Mike Pence is expected to announce late Thursday whether he is running for president, POLITICO has learned. The announcement will appear first in the Indianapolis Star, an aide said. Mike Pence has been deliberating over his political future, stepping down from House Republican leadership as he mulls whether to run for president

on what bedbugs look like, and how to inspect and sanitize belongings. Many people just want to discard all luggage and clothing after discovering an infestation, but Kells and Jeff Hahn say this is unnecessary. The key is to contain all items suspected of carrying bed bugs in plastic bags until the items can be laundered, washed by hand, heated, or frozen, they advise. ''A decade ago we took a bold step forward toward transforming entertainment,'' Steve Ballmer said. We started with gaming with the launch of Xbox.... The next step in that journey was the launch of Xbox Live which transformed gaming experiences with the cloud. That put Xbox front and center in the social entertainment revolution.
